long_description: The multi-use Compact handlebar bag from Topeak converts to a fanny pack--great for carrying a camera, cell phone and other essentials you want close at hand. Divided main compartment has a mesh pocket in lid and 2 side zip pockets on neoprene waist belt. Main compartment is fully padded to protect gear. Quick-release clamp allows easy attachment and detachment from handlebar. Includes rain cover that stashes in mesh lid pocket when not in use. Topeak Compact handlebar bag includes a removable shoulder strap for easy carrying off the bike. Made from durable 2520-denier nylon with water-resistant coating (seams are not sealed).
short_description: The multi-use Compact handlebar bag from Topeak converts to a fanny pack--great for carrying a camera, cell phone and other essentials you want close at hand.
